responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "ED9C62474D0C432D4A22FB8C057CD3E5", "We\'ll need something called a \"liminal condenser.\" It looks like a small, silver box according to the picture, and it has a setting for a mapping crystal and a lens, both of which we also need. Besides Carphin, they also used these at Oakenbane Keep. You might find somethere.")
name: MADD_0021_SergiasNote_87
